vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.payout (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#104-109) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#107)

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#117-121) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#118)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#80-98) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#111-115):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#112)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#113)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#117-121):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#118)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#119)

	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#1): it allows old versions
